price: 62. Waxay yidhaahdeen: “Ma adigaa kan si- daan ku falay ilaahyadayada, Ibraahiimow?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
